title: Provide Security Footage to Police
description: The police have arrived with a warrant to obtain security camera footage related to an investigation.

tasks.description: The security manager verifies the identity of the police officers and the validity of the warrant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The warrant is confirmed to be valid.

tasks.description: Retrieve the specific footage requested (e.g., lobby camera from 10 PM to 11 PM on a specific date).
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct video file is located.

tasks.description: Export the video file to an evidence-grade format and provide it to the police, documenting the transfer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The footage is securely exported and provided to law enforcement, and the action is logged.
